path.style: vector-effect: non-scaling-stroke; opacity: 1; stroke-width: 0.5px; fill: rgb(0, 95, 159); fill-opacity: 1; stroke: rgb(229, 236, 246); stroke-opacity: 1;

text.style: font-family: 'Open Sans', verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 20px; fill: rgb(255, 255, 255); fill-opacity: 1; white-space: pre;

path.style: vector-effect: non-scaling-stroke; opacity: 1; stroke-width: 0.5px; fill: rgb(166, 172, 175); fill-opacity: 1; stroke: rgb(229, 236, 246); stroke-opacity: 1;
